ygData.subject: Galvatron's briefing
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron watched as Quilldart raised his hand in salute. Make sure everyone is here. We have many things to sort out.

 Galvatron watched as Quilldart raised his hand in salute. "Make sure 
everyone is here. We have many things to sort out."

--part1_16d.123054b7.2a8d4014_boundary
